entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

entry.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 01:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 23:00 UTC

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

entry.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.

entry.title: [SBG][Storage] - Object Storage
entry.content:
Feb 1, 12:40 UTC
Monitoring - A workaround has been implemented. Customers aren't impacted anymore since 12:30 UTC.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Feb 1, 12:19 UTC
Update - Service impact : Customers are facing latencies and disconnection with the API s3 responses.
Connection timeout might also be observed for https://s3.sbg.perf.cloud.ovh.net and https://s3.sbg.io.cloud.ovh.net
Ongoing actions : Our teams are still working to solve the issue.

Feb 1, 10:02 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 31/01/2023 23:00 UTCÂ 
Service impact : Customers are facing latencies and disconnection with the API s3 responses.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
